de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.hierarchical

Interface HierarchicalClusteringAlgorithm

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Algorithm
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AGNES, AnderbergHierarchicalClustering, CLINK, ExtractFlatClusteringFromHierarchyEvaluator.DummyHierarchicalClusteringAlgorithm, HDBSCANLinearMemory, SLINK, SLINKHDBSCANLinearMemory

    public interface HierarchicalClusteringAlgorithm
extends Algorithm
    Interface for hierarchical clustering algorithms. This interface allows the algorithms to be used by e.g. ExtractFlatClusteringFromHierarchy.
    Since:
    0.4.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
